name: Giovanni's Pizzeria
description:
Made in 53 hours for the Odd Weekend Game Jam 8

Welcome to Giovanni's Pizzeria! Help Giovanni achieve the Pizzeria dream by being his sous chef and help him make pizzas!

WASD/Arrow to move

Drag and Drop Ingredients to the middle

Note: I am really bad at writing games. Have fun with G̵̩̲͉̫̈́i̵͉̺̿͗o̷̖͖͓͝v̸̗́ạ̶̡̬̮̀̓ņ̷̪͆̎͌͝n̶̨̅̔i̵̲̯͔̺͝!!!

(DO NOT PLAY IF YOU'RE EASILY SCARED OR SOMETHING)
